content: FRANKFURT  Oct 19 German insurer Allianz said its Taiwan business had agreed to sell part of its traditional life insurance portfolio to China Life Insurance .
name: China Life Insurance Company Limited
title: CORRECTED-Allianz sells part of Taiwan life insurance portfolio to China Life​

content: BEIJING  Sept 1 Premium income for China's insurance industry slowed further in the January-July period  as regulatory measures taken to slow risky and aggressive behavior continued to impact the market  official data showed on Friday.

title: REFILE-UPDATE 1-China life insurance premium income growth slows further
